# Aux data

```{r load-aux}

pfw <- pipload::pip_load_aux("pfw") |> 
  {\(.) .[use_groupdata == 1]}()

gdm <- pipload::pip_load_aux("gdm") 

cpi <- pipload::pip_load_aux("cpi") 

ppp <- pipload::pip_load_aux("ppp")

ppp_year <- 2017

```


## filter data 

```{r filter-data}

fpf <- pfw[, .(country_code, 
               year, 
               surveyid_year,
               reporting_year,
               survey_year,

               )]

```

```{r function}


foo <- function(...) {
   # pl <- as.list(environment())
   pl <- list(...)
   
  cond <- "country_code == pl$country_code & 
              survey_year  == pl$reporting_year"
  cond <- parse(text = cond)
  
  
  dt   <- pipload::pip_load_cache(pl$country_code, 
                                  pl$surveyid_year, 
                                  verbose = FALSE)
  
  gdm <- pipload::pip_load_aux("gdm") |> 
    {\(.) .[eval(cond)]}()
  
  dtm <- gdm[,survey_mean_lcu]
  names(dtm) <- gdm[,pop_data_level]
  
  
  cpi_var <- paste0("cpi", ppp_year)  
  cpid <- pipload::pip_load_aux("cpi")  |> 
    {\(.) .[eval(cond)]}()
  
  
  cpi <- cpid[, get(cpi_var)]
  names(cpi) <- cpid[, cpi_data_level]
  
  
  py <- ppp_year # to avoid issues with var name in pppd
  pppd <- pipload::pip_load_aux("ppp")  |> 
    {\(.) .[country_code == pl$country_code &
              ppp_year == py &
              ppp_default_by_year  == TRUE]}() 
  
  ppp <- pppd[, ppp]
  names(ppp) <- pppd[, ppp_data_level]
  
  ppp <- ppp[!is.na(ppp)]
  
  
  ## delfate mean by coverage
  
welfare    <-  dt$welfare
population <-  dt$weight
mean       <- 
  wbpip::deflate_welfare_mean(welfare_mean = dtm, 
                              ppp = ppp, 
                              cpi = cpi) |>
  {\(.) ./(365/12)}()


  
  
  
  
  return(dtm)

                      
}

lf <- as.list(fpf[1:2])
purrr::pmap(lf, foo)

```

# Get quantiles

# lorenz <- "lq"
nq <- 10
lorenz <- NULL
# lorenz <- "lb"
popshare <- seq(from = 1/nq, to = 1, by = 1/nq)

params <- get_gd_quantiles(welfare,
                           population,
                           complete = TRUE, 
                           mean     = mean,
                           popshare = popshare, 
                           lorenz = lorenz)

povlines <- params$dist_stats$quantiles
lorenz   <- params$selected_lorenz$for_dist


wlf_share <- 
  get_gd_wlf_share_by_qtl(params = params, 
                          lorenz = lorenz, 
                          n      = nq) |> 
  {\(.) .$dist_stats$welfare_share}()
  
pop_share <- c(popshare[1], diff(popshare))

avg_wlf_qtl <- (wlf_share*mean)/pop_share

dt <- data.table(
  country_code = country, 
  year         = year, 
  coverage     = coverage, 
  quantile    = povlines, 
  welfare_share = wlf_share, 
  pop_share     = pop_share,
  avg_welfare   = avg_wlf_qtl
)

dt[, bin := .I
   ][bin == max(bin), 
     quantile := NA_real_]
